Package Model

Class Box

java.lang.Object
Model.GameObject
Model.Box
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Box
extends GameObject
This class represents every block the background is made of.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Box

      public Box​(int x, int y, ID id, java.awt.image.BufferedImage bufferedImage, boolean smallHitboxTrue, boolean isPortal)
      Constructor to create an instance.
      Parameters:
      x - x-coordinate where the block should be displayed
      y - y-coordinate where the block should be displayed
      id - this object's id
      bufferedImage - the image which should represent the Box
      smallHitboxTrue - checks if the small hitbox is enabled
      isPortal - checks if a portal can be spawned

    • getBounds

      public java.awt.Rectangle getBounds()
      Returns the bounds of the generated block
      Specified by:
      getBounds in class GameObject
      Returns:
      the bounds as a 64x64 rectangle, with the position of the given block
